snippet: A 10-year-old boy was shot in the torso in the Williamsburg neighborhood just after 11 p.m. on Monday, the police said. His wounds were not thought to be life-threatening.
lead_paragraph: A 10-year-old boy was shot in the torso in the Williamsburg neighborhood just after 11 p.m. on Monday, the police said. His wounds were not thought to be life-threatening.

headline.seo: Boy, 10, Shot by Stray Bullet in Williamsburg, Brooklyn
headline.main: 10-Year-Old Boy Shot by Stray Bullet in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: 10-Year-Old Boy Shot by Stray Bullet in Brooklyn
